67.name: For the Legion!
67.description: You brought heat to the Flame Legion.
67.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Deadly Force," "Ghostbore Artillery," "Operation: Bulwark," or "Quick and Quiet."

353.name: Forgotten Stream
353.description: Seriously, who put a door here?
353.requirement: Locate the stream deep beneath Orr.

381.name: Volcanic Fractal Stabilizer
381.description: It might be time to get a new pair of shoes.
381.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

406.name: PvP Monthly Wins
406.description: Victory or death... but mostly victory!

502.name: Leveler
502.requirement: Gain a level. Also applies to level 80 characters.

560.name: Minor in Elusion
560.requirement: Complete World 1, Zone 3 without getting caught by sticky plants or flytraps.

620.name: Southsun Skinny Dipper
620.description: Swim off the coast of the Pearl Island resort beach on Southsun Cove without your armor.

666.name: No More Secrets (2013)
666.requirement: It's time to confront the criminal behind the effigy incident. Return to the Lion's Arch crime scene.

701.name: Kookoochoo the Incredulous
701.requirement: Watch Kookoochoo the Incredulous's breathtaking fire breathing show.

726.name: Flaunt It
726.requirement: Use all six Signature Moves against your opponents.

776.name: Champion of the Wild
776.requirement: Represent Hoelbrak in the Crown Pavilion. Escort norn emissaries to hot-air balloons.

778.name: Party Crasher Crusher
778.description: This is all just a bit too coincidental. Someone must be pulling the strings...
778.requirement: Kill  Aetherblade pirate or other enemies trying to spoil the Jubilee.

800.name: Savage Brute
800.requirement: Defeat Masticus with max stacks of Bloodlust active.

806.name: High Stakes Gambler
806.requirement: Win  third tier matches with five active gambits.

820.name: Closing Ceremony Attendee
820.requirement: Attend the Closing Ceremony at the Crown Pavilion.

869.name: It Was An Ambush
869.requirement: Survive the log raft ambush without dying in World 2, Zone 1.

878.name: Become the Master
878.requirement: Defeat all assassins in World 2, Zone 2.

882.name: Hunt the Dragon!
882.requirement: Search for  clues of dragons in Sparkfly Fen.

1141.name: Tower Treasure Hunter
1141.requirement: Open  tri-key chest in the Tower of Nightmares.

1208.name: Nightmare Euthanizer
1208.requirement: Complete "The Nightmare Ends" story instance, having solved all of Scarlet's puzzles.

1290.name: Spreading Wintersday Joy V
1290.description: Make the lives of the less fortunate in Divinity's Reach a little better.
1290.requirement: Make a donation to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

1300.name: Five Total Solo Arena Wins
1300.description: There is no I in team, but there is me.
1300.requirement: Win  Solo Arena Match in PvP

1323.name: Boss Thumper VII
1323.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1327.name: Boss Thumper XI
1327.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1392.name: Please Follow Me to the Exit
1392.description: Story Instance: Escape from Lion's Arch
1392.requirement: Find and rescue all 6 hidden evacuees.

1544.name: Castles in the Air
1544.requirement: Capture  enemy castle in the eternal battlegrounds.

1553.name: Reactor Robber
1553.requirement: Capture  enemy reactor in Edge of the Mists.

1654.name: Ruler of Shinies
1654.requirement: Defeat Queen Chrii'kkt IV. Active during the sandstorm at tier 4 or greater.

1680.name: Not on My Watch
1680.requirement: Capture and defend Coiled Watch in Frostgorge Sound without any casualties.

1744.name: Jormag Defense Guide
1744.requirement: Unlock all of the corrupted weapons in your wardrobe, and collect various Jormag related items.
1744.locked_text: Loot Jormag's Claw Fragment from the Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound.

1858.name: Daily PvP Defender
1858.requirement: Help defend a point in a PvP match.

1972.name: Daily Kryta Lumberer
1972.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1972.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Kryta maps: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, and Southsun Cove.

2056.name: Distorted Reflection
2056.requirement: Use the torch of divine fire to defeat your doppelganger from the old mirror in the Durmand Priory's special collections.

2069.name: Covered in Bees!
2069.requirement: Use a honeycomb to avoid taking damage from the Mordrem Vinewrath's beam while fighting the Mordrem Beekeeper.

2146.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Holdfast Hollow
2146.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2344.name: Headhunter
2344.requirement: Defeat the Legendary Archdiviner at the top of the Cliffside fractal while only killing five cultists or chanters. This does not include the initial entourage. Must be completed on scale 21 or above.

2349.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Twisting Viaduct
2349.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2403.name: Untethered
2403.requirement: Avoid being struck by any vine whips while climbing the helix.

2414.name: Munition Re-Upper
2414.requirement: Gather Mordrem vine pods for Briallen to make explosives.

2426.name: Scribe
2426.requirement: Reach rating  in the scribing discipline.

2626.name: Bo
2626.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the daredevil's staff, Bo.
2626.locked_text: Begin training the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

bits.text: Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2724.name: League Dominator—Champion
2724.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2724.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches in a day.

2734.name: Mystic Essence Collector—Elite
2734.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.
2734.requirement: Obtain by combining the following items in the Mystic Forge: Essence of Success, 20 Vicious Claws, 50 Large Claws, and 10 Globs of Dark Matter.

2796.name: Branded Bane
2796.description: Crystallized corpses as far as the eye can see!
2796.requirement: Kill  Branded during the Shatterer battle.

2874.name: Interior Design 203
2874.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 2, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2877.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 101
2877.requirement: Dig up two bauble chests in World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2943.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Tiger Training Guide
2943.description: "As my tigers grow, it's a daily challenge to learn for myself the lessons I need to be able to impart to the cubs when they're ready."

bits.text: Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin after obtaining the Baby Book.
Defeat the Golem Mark II in Mount Maelstrom while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat Taida Covington in Bloodtide Coast while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat Ulgoth the Modniir in Harathi Hinterlands while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat the Champion Ram near Krongar Pass in Timberline Falls while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat the Vine Wrath in the Silverwastes while carrying a tiger cub.
Complete the Noble Crash Site meta-event in Verdant Brink while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat Risen Gorillas in Cursed Shore while carrying a tiger cub.
Defeat the Bandit-Trained Broodmother near Wynchona Woods in Harathi Hinterlands while carrying a tiger cub.
Complete the Coddler's Cove jumping puzzle near Mellagan's Grotto in Timberline Falls while carrying a tiger cub.
Protect Fen as he makes his way into the Bonerattler Caverns in Harathi Hinterlands while carrying a tiger cub.
Talk to Tholaun near Almuten Estates in Gendarran Fields and fulfill his request while carrying a tiger cub.
Protect the Lupikids as they search for treasure near Cornucopian Fields in Gendarran Fields while carrying a tiger cub.

2965.name: Fractal Initiate
2965.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 1 to 25.

3043.name: Bloodstone Magic, Not Even Once
3043.requirement: Stop Justiciar Adrienne from drawing a full circle.

3071.name: The Memoirs of Justiciar Bauer
3071.requirement: Find the scattered pages in Bloodstone Fen.

3073.name: This Time, Stay Dead
3073.requirement: Defeat the Ghostly Justiciar in the Colosseum of the Faithful, located above Bloodstone Fen.

3192.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 58
3192.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3208.name: Another Goo Puddle
3208.requirement: Get crushed to a paste by Ensolyss.

3227.name: Journey to Bitterfrost Frontier
3227.description: Journal: Journey to Bitterfrost Frontier Completed
3227.requirement: Travel to Bitterfrost Frontier to find Braham and the abomination for Taimi's sample.

3318.name: Temple Champion
3318.description: Only those with a clear mind will attain victory.
3318.requirement: Win  rated match in the Temple of the Silent Storm.

3368.name: Saboteur
3368.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that destroys a siege weapon and wins the match in rated Battle of Kyhlo  time.

3436.name: A Henge Away from Home
3436.description: Your dedication to nature is proving fruitful, but there is still much to do. Continue to show your respect for Melandru's druids and help bring their magic out into the world again.

bits.text: Dropped by the Destroyer Aestus in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Destroyer Ignis in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Molten Desecrator in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Aestus Runestone, Ignis Runestone, and Desecrator Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Bring a Volcanic Runestone, a Glacial Runestone, a Charged Runestone, and an Earthen Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Bring a Vision Crystal to Kodama in Druid's Grotto in Draconis Mons.
Bring 10 Fire Orchids and 5 Charged Lodestones to Kodama in the Savage Rise.
Bring 10 Fire Orchids and 5 Glacial Lodestones to Liriodendron in the watering hole of the Savage Rise.
Bring 10 Fire Orchids and 5 Onyx Lodestones to Broadleaf on a ledge above the Savage Rise.
Bring 10 Fire Orchids and 5 Molten Lodestones to Rosewood on a ledge above the Ancient Hollow.
Plant 3 Fire Orchid Seeds in the garden of Dierdre's Steps in Mount Maelstrom.
Plant 3 Fire Orchid Seeds in the garden of the oasis in Dry Top.
Plant 3 Fire Orchid Seeds at the Cathedral of Verdance in Cursed Shore.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil on one of the islands of the Eastern Boiling Sea in Draconis Mons.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil overlooking Wind Rider Ledge in Draconis Mons.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil of the bioluminescent cave above Rata Arcanum in Draconis Mons.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil on the ledge overlooking the Frothing Pedestal in Draconis Mons.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil in the Nu II Vault in Draconis Mons.
Plant a Fire Orchid Seed in the fertile soil above the Ancient Hollow in Draconis Mons.

3460.name: Roll for Greed
3460.description: May Lady Luck be on your side.

3485.name: Shining Blade Secrets
3485.requirement: Talk to Anise about the Shining Blade's plans.

3497.name: Cleaning Up the Mess
3497.requirement: Kill the White Mantle reinforcements after preventing them from being called.

3504.name: Timberline Falls Insight: Copperhammer Mines
3504.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Timberline Falls.

3570.name: Reins of the Raptor
3570.requirement: Now that you have your raptor, take it out to help those in need at renown hearts, and gain tasty treats for your raptor as a reward.

bits.text: Given by Aksim, upon completion of the Sparking the Flame story mission.
Receive a treat from Priestess Karima outside of Amnoon in return for aiding the refugees at Marifa Camp.
Given by Priest Hakim in the Temple of Kormir for bringing him supplies from Priestess Karima.
Given by Mayor Kabir in Destiny's Gorge, in return for helping the villagers of Zephyr's Trace.
Requires collection of other treats first. Given by Camp Cook Rehman in the Marifa refugee camp outside of Amnoon.

3575.name: Justice of the Blade
3575.requirement: Complete each task to aid the Shining Blade's investigation into bandit activity.

3581.name: Beast of War
3581.requirement: Take the fight to the front lines.

3696.name: Shadows Intel: Gold
3696.requirement: Gather documents for Order of Shadows agents before time runs out!

3736.name: Open Skies: Sunspear Sanctuary
3736.requirement: Gather Sunspear relics from all 5 maps and restore them to the Sunspear sanctuary.

bits.text: Collect the Sunspear relics from Desert Highlands.
Collect the Sunspear relics from Crystal Oasis.
Collect the Sunspear relics from Elon Riverlands.
Collect the Sunspear relics from the Desolation.
Collect the Sunspear relics from the Domain of Vabbi.
Place the griffon eggs in their respective nests.
Set the Sunspear runes in their respective places around the Sunspear crest.

3760.name: Daily Desert Forager
3760.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
3760.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

3803.name: Domain of Vabbi Insight: Kodash Brazier
3803.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Domain of Vabbi.

3815.name: Crystal Desert Explorer
3815.description: You've explored all major areas of the Crystal Desert.
3815.requirement: Explore all areas in the Crystal Desert.

bits.text: Explore all areas in Crystal Oasis.
Explore all areas in the Desert Highlands.
Explore all areas in the Elon Riverlands.
Explore all areas in the Desolation.
Explore all areas in the Domain of Vabbi.

3834.name: Open Skies: Elon Riverlands
3834.requirement: Collect  relics to restore the Sunspear sanctuary.

bits.text: Defeat Warden Jabari and free the prisoners in Elon Riverlands to acquire this relic.
Restore the lost equipment of the Sunspear hermit in the Elon Riverlands to acquire this relic.
Solve the mystery of the lost spirit's memories in the Elon Riverlands to acquire this relic.
Purchase this relic from Follower Xunn in Elon Riverlands.
Purchase this relic from Ebele in Elon Riverlands.
Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
Collect this egg from the griffon roost in Elon Riverlands.
Collect this egg from atop a mesa over the Vulture Drifts in the Elon Riverlands.
Collect this egg from a shattered tower high above the Elon Riverlands.

3859.name: Desolation Griffon Master: Gold
3859.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3890.name: Iberu, We Hardly Knew You
3890.requirement: Take out Archon Iberu in under 2 minutes.

3955.name: Under the Stars
3955.requirement: Speak with potential allies hiding within the Astralarium.

3982.name: Tipple Toes
3982.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
3982.requirement: Escape the dungeons without being spotted by the drunken Awakened.

4017.name: Daily Domain of Istan Hidden Stash Hunter
4017.requirement: Open three Hidden Stashes within the Domain of Istan.

4021.name: Ancient Weapons: Silver
4021.requirement: Collect ancient Sunspear weapons and return them to the rebels before time runs out!

4051.name: (Annual) Season's Generosity
4051.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4056.name: Ulla's Rival
4056.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday.

4126.name: I Make This Golem Look Good
4126.requirement: Remain undetected while infiltrating the Inquest facility inside a golem.

4132.name: Insuppressible
4132.description: Don't take this nefarious Inquest construct lightly.
4132.requirement: Defeat an Inquest suppressor golem at the facility around Rata Primus.

4209.name: Decimation
4209.requirement: Kill 6 Awakened with a single bomb blast.

4247.name: A New Ally
4247.requirement: Win over the heket and forge a new alliance.

4293.name: The Rise and Fall of Kookoochoo
4293.description: Piece together the fate of Kookoochoo the Incredulous.
4293.requirement: Search the Labyrinthine Cliffs and find all the fliers made to promote Koocoochoo's various acts over the years.

4303.name: Bundle Plunderer
4303.requirement: Plunder 250 bundles of loot during the Labyrinthine Cliffs treasure hunt.

4327.name: Destroyer Destroyer
4327.requirement: Kill  destroyer in the Crown Pavilion.

4341.name: Full House
4341.description: Sun's Refuge was once bustling and full of life. It will be so again.
4341.requirement: Discover and complete all the collections within Sun's Refuge.
4341.locked_text: Complete Legacy to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: The Convergence of Sorrow I: Elegy

4359.name: "A Star to Guide Us" Mastery
4359.requirement: Complete all  "A Star to Guide Us" achievements.

4410.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Death-Branded Shatterer Battler
4410.requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

4416.name: Some Disassembly Required
4416.description: It's quite simple once you break it down.
4416.requirement: Defeat the Conjured Amalgamate on challenge mode.

4425.name: Run Around for No Reason: Silver
4425.requirement: Participate in a delightful romp at the suggestion of an old acquaintance.

4491.name: Straight to the Heart
4491.requirement: Help Freezie within three heart phases in the Secret Lair of the Snowmen.

4541.name: Daily Thunderhead Peaks Branded Masses Collector
4541.requirement: Collect 10 Branded Masses in Thunderhead Peaks.

4558.name: Chasing Tales: Azra the Sunslayer
4558.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood longbow and perform tasks to re-create Azra's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Azra the Sunslayer.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Azra: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Azra: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Azra: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Azra at a heroic font.

4671.name: Skyscale Care
4671.requirement: Care for your baby skyscale until it's large enough to leave the nest.

bits.text: Crafted in the Mystic Forge by combining a Charged Quartz Crystal with Globs of Ectoplasm, Bloodstone Dust, and Red Meat. Can also be purchased from the trading post.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.
Obtained by feeding skyscale food to your hatchling. A happy skyscale can be fed up to 4 times daily.

4672.name: Skyscale Rider: Maguuma Wastes
4672.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in the Maguuma Wastes.

4684.name: Skyscale of Blood
4684.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with blood.

bits.text: Speak with General Almorra Soulkeeper at Pact Command in Dragonfall.
Defeat 25 foes while under the effect of Almorra's Directive.
Defeat 50 more foes while under the effect of Almorra's Directive.
Defeat 75 more foes while under the effect of Almorra's Directive.

4781.name: Passport to Ahdashim
4781.description: The worthiest of heroes gain the greatest access.
4781.requirement: Complete all other achievements in The Key of Ahdashim raid instance.

4813.name: (Annual) Masters of the Arena
4813.requirement: Defeat all 6 holographic champions in the Dragon Arena. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4861.name: (Annual) Practiced Pursuit
4861.requirement: Complete  Pavilion Pursuit course lap in the Crown Pavilion (race event or adventure). Finishing in the race event grants extra progress. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4918.name: Additional Secrets of the Khan-Ur
4918.requirement: Open a long-hidden vault and loot what's inside.

4929.name: Model Diplomat
4929.requirement: Give Bangar what he wants during his speech.

4942.name: Cattle Custodian
4942.requirement: Get rid of the devourers at the farm without losing a single cow.

4956.name: Pledged
4956.requirement: Defeat the Ooze Pit's grand champion while pledged to all three legions.

bits.text: Defeated the grand champion while pledged to assist the Ash Legion.
Defeated the grand champion while pledged to assist the Blood Legion.
Defeated the grand champion while pledged to assist the Iron Legion.

4983.name: Flash Freeze
4983.description: Story Instance: A Race to Arms
4983.requirement: Escape Bitter Horn within the time limit.

5026.name: Luminary
5026.requirement: Complete all the light puzzles in East Bjora Marches.

5189.name: Heavy Rival
5189.requirement: Compete with Cinder Steeltemper to bring out the best in both of you.

5250.name: World Lore: Gyala Delve
5250.requirement: Learn all you can from Ari, the region lore specialist.

5267.name: Special Mission: Disrupt Supply Lines
5267.locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

5294.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Port
5294.requirement: Spend  War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Port Cascadia in Drizzlewood Coast.

5342.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Two
5342.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Two.

5379.name: A Simple Negotiation
5379.requirement: Complete the story chapter A Simple Negotiation.

5536.name: Champions Insight: Fields of Ruin
5536.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5537.name: Dragon Slayer Arms Master
5537.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Dragon Slayer weapons.

5540.name: Champions Insight: Thunderhead Keep
5540.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Thunderhead Keep Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5578.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Snowden Drifts
5578.requirement: Complete the Snowden Drifts Dragon Response Mission.

5614.name: Daily: Olmakhan Donations
5614.requirement: Donate needed materials to the Olmakhan.

5689.name: Steelcaught
5689.requirement: During the Dragonstorm encounter, prevent Jormag's champion from using his elite skill  time.

5716.name: Return to Dragon Vigil
5716.requirement: Complete the mission Dragon Vigil in Living World Season 3 Episode 2.

5746.name: Return to The Last Chance
5746.requirement: Complete the mission The Last Chance in Living World Season 3 Episode 6.

5765.name: Reconquer the Hidden Depths
5765.requirement: Collect key fragments from lesser nightmare pods, and unlock the greater nightmare pod while the Hidden Depths is dark.

5768.name: Return to The Mystery Cave
5768.requirement: Complete the mission The Mystery Cave in Living World Season 2 Episode 8.

5776.name: Return to Tracking the Aspect Masters
5776.requirement: Complete the mission Tracking the Aspect Masters in Living World Season 2 Episode 6.

5787.name: Crop Harvester: Dry Top
5787.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Dry Top.

5799.name: Ore Miner: Silverwastes
5799.requirement: Mine ore  times in the Silverwastes.

5807.name: Legacy of the Llama Locator
5807.requirement: Find the legendary llamas hidden in Dry Top.

5827.name: Community Warlord
5827.requirement: Win a WvW community tournament run by an ArenaNet Partner.

5870.name: Crop Harvester: Thunderhead Peaks
5870.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Thunderhead Peaks.

5887.name: Woodland Management: Domain of Istan
5887.requirement: Log wood  times in the Domain of Istan.

5914.name: Return to Snapping Steel
5914.requirement: Complete the story mission Snapping Steel in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 3.

5959.name: Renowned Hero: Thunderhead Peaks
5959.requirement: Complete renown hearts in Thunderhead Peaks.

5968.name: Revenge of the Metal Legion
5968.requirement: Complete the Metal Legion Concert meta-event in Grothmar Valley.

6180.name: No-Fun Police
6180.requirement: Erase  Jade Brotherhood graffiti in New Kaineng City.

6189.name: Wind through the Walls
6189.requirement: Reach the end of the jumping puzzle in the ruins of Old Kaineng.

6194.name: Cultures of Echovald: The Tengu
6194.requirement: Participate in all the events related to the tengu of Echovald Wilds.

bits.text: Compete with tengu youngsters in the Mori Village archery contest.
Track down the missing tengu, Tateo.
Rescue Tateo from the corrupted wildlife.

6197.name: Adept Catalyst
6197.requirement: Begin training the elementalist's catalyst elite specialization.

6239.name: Illuminating Seitung Province
6239.description: May each lantern you light spark happiness within you, not only in the completion of the task, but through the act of lighting the world.
6239.requirement: Transfer power to  jade lanterns at points of interest in Seitung Province. These lanterns will only appear after 100% map exploration.

bits.text: Hero Challenge: Source of the Springs

6246.name: All Due Respect
6246.requirement: Follow Kasmeer's lead to be a model of court decorum.

6247.name: Working as Intended
6247.requirement: Destroy  flotsams with your boat in New Kaineng City.

6279.name: My Guild Hall Smells of Fish Progeny
6279.description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.

6287.name: Gold Essence Weapon Collection
6287.requirement: Unlock all  Gold Essence weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6328.name: Wandering Cantha
6328.requirement: Complete daily achievements in End of Dragons.

6349.name: Revealing Ritualists
6349.requirement: Reveal and defeat 10 Speaker ritualists during the cemetery ghost event.

6350.name: Unconquered
6350.requirement: Make your final stand without being downed.

6375.name: Pocket Maw Crystals
6375.requirement: Throw 10 charged crystals at the Jade Maw.

6415.name: Taxi!
6415.description: Raptor Taxi: Making boring commutes terrifying and unnecessarily dangerous.
6415.requirement: Get a ride from each raptor taxi in Seitung Province.

6506.name: Dragon's End Fisher
6506.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6506.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Dragon's End.

6589.name: Defeating the Risen in the Ruins of Orr
6589.requirement: Defeat  Risen enemy in the Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, or Cursed Shore.

6664.name: Rallying
6664.requirement:
Rally from a downed state  time.

<c=@reminder>Rallying allows you to recover from a downed state by defeating a foe that grants experience.</c>

6688.name: Picking Up the Pieces
6688.requirement: Complete the story chapter Picking Up the Pieces.

6846.name: Black Lion Requisition Investor
6846.requirement: Complete  Requisition Officer Missions during the event period to reach the next tier.

6860.name: Terror Manifest
6860.requirement: Acquire all items to manifest a terrifying weapon.
6860.locked_text: Purchase the associated Historical Weapon Diagram from Requisitions Specialists in Gyala Delve to unlock.

6876.name: Let Them Fight
6876.requirement: Fully charge Xunlai Jade's mysterious shipment during the final battle of Gyala Delve.

6898.name: The Beast Is Down!
6898.requirement: Defeat the ravenous wanderer  times in the final battle of Gyala Delve.

6914.name: New Kaineng Skiff Racer: Silver
6914.requirement: Complete the New Kaineng Skiff Race with a silver rating or better.

6991.name: Amnytas Mastery
6991.description: Isgarren and Vass stood over the edge of Amnytas, looking down. This place was worth protecting—Tyria. Amnytas would be their vessel to do so.

6995.name: Eternal Skywatch Archipelago: Unlocking the Wizard's Tower
6995.description: Frankly, Lyhr should have forged multiple keys.
6995.requirement: Forge a key to the Wizard's Tower.

7092.name: There and...
7092.description: Enjoy the scenery at all costs.
7092.requirement: Ride a skyscale from the blue orb near the Beacon of Ages Waypoint at Wizard's Ascent to the southern gate of the Wizard's Tower in under 10 minutes without dismounting or teleporting.

7168.name: Cursed Shore Incursions
7168.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Cursed Shore.

7228.name: Sandswept Isles Rift Hunting
7228.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Sandswept Isles.

7268.name: Fractal Rush Champion
7268.requirement: Earn Fractal Rush trophies by looting the final chest in fractals and completing Fractal Rush achievements.

7633.name: Cruising Amnytas: Lyhr's Tower to Isgarren's Tower
7633.description: Skyscale dodges can cover a good amount of distance if you need a little boost.
7633.requirement: Ride a skyscale from the vista near Lyhr's Tower to Isgarren's Tower.

7757.name: Daily Battle for Lion's Arch
7757.requirement: Complete events during the battle for Lion's Arch. Participating in the defeat of the Assault Knight Trio during the finale grants extra progress.

7823.name: Artisan of Arms: Engineer's Short Bow
7823.description: The chain reactions from an engineer's short-bow arrows yield interesting mixtures and trigger exceedingly noteworthy discoveries.
7823.requirement: Defeat enemies with a short bow as an engineer.

7868.name: Fabled Revered
7868.description: Sending my enemies to meet the legends.
7868.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a revenant.

7909.name: Return to Season 2
7909.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Season 2 event.

7929.name: Legendary Magus
7929.description: Standing on a smoldering pile of your enemies.
7929.requirement: Win  rated arena game as an elementalist.

7944.name: Gunnar's Hold Veteran
7944.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8057.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Dreadwing: Silver
8057.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8157.name: Fight Another Day
8157.requirement: Successfully defend the base at Forager's Hunt with all six kodan still alive.

8177.name: Feed the Flames
8177.description: That's going to leave a mark...
8177.requirement: Die by fire during a troll bonfire.

8235.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Ruminant Fields
8235.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8248.name: Stronger as a Pack
8248.requirement: Successfully complete an expedition without a single kodan being downed.

8341.name: (Repeatable) Janthir Syntri: Forager's Hunt Renown Heart
8341.description: You're why the bearkin can rest at ease.
8341.requirement: Successfully complete the Forager's Hunt renown heart on  unique days.

8585.name: Scan and Soothe
8585.requirement: Stop the Mistburned wildlife from destroying Priory scanners.

8609.name: Hopscotch Master
8609.description: Can you jump your way out of this one?
8609.requirement: Defeat Ura while the challenge mote is active without taking damage from any of her shock waves.

8651.name: (Daily) Heights of Glory
8651.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, successfully complete events.

8699.name: Rolling Competitor: Lakeside Loop (Weekly)
8699.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Gendarran Fields. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8730.name: Unknown Nightmares: Orrax Contained
8730.requirement:
This collection can be a useful reference for crafting the precursor backpack, Orrax Contained.

Completion of this achievement will also award a homestead decoration.

bits.text: Received from completing the Unknown Nightmares: Experiments in the Shadows achievement
If needed, remnants of this item can be purchased from the renown heart vendor in Mistburned Barrens.
If needed, remnants can be purchased from Ward Trader Sampaguita in Bava Nisos.

8766.name: Bava Nisos Incursions
8766.requirement: Repel titanspawn incursions in Bava Nisos.

8769.name: Bava Nisos Mastery
8769.requirement: Complete  map achievements throughout Bava Nisos.

8777.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Greer: Gold
8777.description: Make Greer regret facing the wayfinder.
8777.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.
